item.title: Show #43: Cruise Control
item.description: As we're on cruise control headed into the weekend, we're bringing you some great tunes by Phestur, Bob Hughes, and Alamantra. Enjoy your 30 minute escape!
item.dc:creator: The Vast Wasteland
item.itunes:summary: As we're on cruise control headed into the weekend, we're bringing you some great tunes by Phestur, Bob Hughes, and Alamantra. Enjoy your 30 minute escape!

item.title: Show #42: Anything Goes - Hilarious sound pranks!
item.description: Some hilarious Howard Stern prank calls and voicemail hilarity! Program note and warning: This episode contains very explicit language and material and is not suitable for youngsters or those who are offended by very harsh language or content. Those individuals are strongly encouraged to skip this episode. Now, on to the fun!
item.dc:creator: The Vast Wasteland
item.itunes:summary: Some hilarious Howard Stern prank calls and voicemail hilarity! Program note and warning: This episode contains very explicit language and material and is not suitable for youngsters or those who are offended by very harsh language or content. Those individuals are strongly encouraged to skip this episode. Now, on to the fun!

item.title: Show #41: Anything Goes - Surf's Up!
item.description: Summer's coming, so on a cold, windy and stormy night here are some surf beach tunes to help get you in a warmer mood and looking forward to surf and sun.
item.dc:creator: The Vast Wasteland
item.itunes:summary: Summer's coming, so on a cold, windy and stormy night here are some surf beach tunes to help get you in a warmer mood and looking forward to surf and sun.

item.title: Show #40: Anything Goes - Hilarious prank calls!
item.description: Our best-yet prank calls! Hear the guy from India who was set up by his wife who thinks he is cheating on her..and steps right into the trap! Or the girl whose drug test results were pranked by her mom....and hear what she offers the "drug test guy" in exchange for being able to re-take the test!! Prepare for the hilarity and stand by for pleasure!!
item.dc:creator: The Vast Wasteland
item.itunes:summary: Our best-yet prank calls! Hear the guy from India who was set up by his wife who thinks he is cheating on her..and steps right into the trap! Or the girl whose drug test results were pranked by her mom....and hear what she offers the "drug test guy" in exchange for being able to re-take the test!! Prepare for the hilarity and stand by for pleasure!!

item.title: Show #39: Instrumentals
item.description: Some great instrumentals by 3rd Man (a TVL favorite), Jim Farley, Bob Hughes (another TVL favorite!), Mike Norton, and Rough Sax. Pull up a seat and enjoy!
item.dc:creator: The Vast Wasteland
item.itunes:summary: Some great instrumentals by 3rd Man (a TVL favorite), Jim Farley, Bob Hughes (another TVL favorite!), Mike Norton, and Rough Sax. Pull up a seat and enjoy!

item.title: Show #38: Celtic Night!
item.description: This is our Celtic show featuring various Irish and Celtic folk tunes and jigs to get the heart pumping. So put on your kilt, dust off the pipes, grab the fiddle and your Irish whistle and enjoy!
item.dc:creator: The Vast Wasteland
item.itunes:summary: This is our Celtic show featuring various Irish and Celtic folk tunes and jigs to get the heart pumping. So put on your kilt, dust off the pipes, grab the fiddle and your Irish whistle and enjoy!

item.title: Show #37: Anything Goes - Various Rock
item.description: Some great arena rock tunes by the likes of Soulseeker, Crush, Hellsingland Underground, and Little Fish Big Pond along with Phestur closing out the show with their seminal tune, "Epiphany." Also, by popular demand, Blondstar is included!
item.dc:creator: The Vast Wasteland
item.itunes:summary: Some great arena rock tunes by the likes of Soulseeker, Crush, Hellsingland Underground, and Little Fish Big Pond along with Phestur closing out the show with their seminal tune, "Epiphany." Also, by popular demand, Blondstar is included!

item.title: Show #36: Phestur's Fine Pompeii - Final Mixes!
item.description: Here they are, the FINAL mixes from Phestur's soon-to-be-released CD, "Fine Pompeii" and you heard 'em on here first! Special thanks to Phestur for the tunes. You can catch Phestur at: http://www.phestur.com.

item.title: Show #35: Goofy A$$ Award Show
item.description: This week's Goofy A$$ Award show, including some tunes by Alamantra, Stressbitch, and David Ipolito. Semi-finalists were Britney Spears, Richard Thompson, Adnan Ghalib, Jessica Dwyer, and Mary J. Blidge. Find out who the Magic Quarter chose for this week's winner!
item.dc:creator: The Vast Wasteland

item.title: Show #34: Featured artist - DJ Hype
item.description: Featuring local talent, DJ Hype! Cool tunes with his flavor injected. Check out DJ Hype's material at http://www.myspace.com/whoisdjhype
item.dc:creator: The Vast Wasteland
item.itunes:summary: Featuring local talent, DJ Hype! Cool tunes with his flavor injected. Check out DJ Hype's material at http://www.myspace.com/whoisdjhype

item.title: Show #33: Wednesday Night Playroll
item.description: Featuring the music of Kirsty Hawkshaw, Bob Hughes, and Hudson Cerone. Also presenting the list of Goofy A$$ Award semi-finalists for this week: Repeat offender Britney Spears, Richard "My judge cut me a HUGE break" Thompson, Adnan "Cassanova" Ghalib, Jessica Dwyer, and Mary J. "Pass the roids" Blige. Find out more about the "why" of our semi-finalists on the show!

"Pass the roids" Blige. Find out more about the "why" of our semi-finalists on the show!

item.title: Show #32: Spotlight on the music of Bob Hughes
item.description: Our feature on the music of Bob Hughes, with special guest Bob Hughes himself answering some questions about himself and his music. Join the show for some great tunes and a great ride. Enjoy!
item.dc:creator: The Vast Wasteland
item.itunes:summary: Our feature on the music of Bob Hughes, with special guest Bob Hughes himself answering some questions about himself and his music. Join the show for some great tunes and a great ride. Enjoy!

item.title: Show #31: Goofy A$$ Award Show!
item.description: Our finalists for this week's Goofy A$$ Award were: Billy Zane and fiancee Kelly Brook, Kerry Katona, the Spice Girls, Chris Langham, and Alessandro DiNunzio. The Magic Quarter has spoken and one of our lucky finalists was the chosen one.

item.itunes:summary: Our finalists for this week's Goofy A$$ Award were: Billy Zane and fiancee Kelly Brook, Kerry Katona, the Spice Girls, Chris Langham, and Alessandro DiNunzio. The Magic Quarter has spoken and one of our lucky finalists was the chosen one.

item.title: Show #30: Anything Goes - Political jabs!
item.description: With election year 2008 now underway, we begin taking jabs at politicians, beginning at the top with some of the "Bushisms" already in our library. More jabs to follow! Also, introducing "Congressman Bob."
item.dc:creator: The Vast Wasteland
item.itunes:summary: With election year 2008 now underway, we begin taking jabs at politicians, beginning at the top with some of the "Bushisms" already in our library. More jabs to follow! Also, introducing "Congressman Bob."

item.title: Show #29: Anything Goes - Experimental Rock
item.description: Some great experimental rock tunes by Fisher, 3rd Man (a TVL favorite), and Admonitor. Also a review of the Goofy A$$ Award semi-finalists for this week and some of our new "fake" commercials!
item.dc:creator: The Vast Wasteland
item.itunes:summary: Some great experimental rock tunes by Fisher, 3rd Man (a TVL favorite), and Admonitor. Also a review of the Goofy A$$ Award semi-finalists for this week and some of our new "fake" commercials!

item.title: Show #28: Anything Goes - Blues
item.description: Some great blues by Bluesman Deluxe. Also announcing this week's semi-finalists for the Goofy A$$ Award: Billy Zane and fiancee Kelly Brook, Kerry Katona, the Spice Girls (yep, they're baaaaack), Chris Langham, and Alessandro diNunzio. Be on the lookout on a future show for excerpts from comedian author Louie Lawent's book, "The Louie/God Interviews."

item.title: Show #26: Best of TVL, 2007
item.description: Best-of TVL for 2007. This show highlights some of the bits that listeners emailed us about most frequently, including "Blond Star" which is by far our most requested bit! Be on the look out for our newest upcoming "character," Congressman Bob.
item.dc:creator: The Vast Wasteland
item.itunes:summary: Best-of TVL for 2007. This show highlights some of the bits that listeners emailed us about most frequently, including "Blond Star" which is by far our most requested bit! Be on the look out for our newest upcoming "character," Congressman Bob.

item.title: Show #25: Happy New Year, 2008!
item.description: From all of us at TVL, to you and your family and friends, have a happy and safe New Year. We wish you great things for 2008!
item.dc:creator: The Vast Wasteland
item.itunes:summary: From all of us at TVL, to you and your family and friends, have a happy and safe New Year. We wish you great things for 2008!

item.title: Show #22: Christmas 2007
item.description: Our 2007 Christmas show highlighting some traditional Christmas tunes. Happy Holidays!
item.dc:creator: The Vast Wasteland
item.itunes:summary: Our 2007 Christmas show highlighting some traditional Christmas tunes. Happy Holidays!

item.title: Show #19: Spotlight on Alamantra
item.description: Featured artist, Alamantra. You'll hear some great tunes from this group out of Birmingham, Alabama USA. Check them out at http://www.alamantra.org and http://www.myspace.com/alamantra and share the love! Also a reminder that the semi-finalists for tomorrow night's Goofy A$$ Award show are (in no particular order): Trevor White ("Dubliner" editor), Jessica Alba (sex kitten who has decided she wants to be shy), Paris Hilton (promoting her new sparkling wine in a can, showing HER can), Jessica Simpson, and Britney Spears for stealing a $1.39 Bic lighter. Interesting note: We actually scooped major-market terrestrial radio on that one!!
item.dc:creator: The Vast Wasteland
item.itunes:summary: Featured artist, Alamantra. You'll hear some great tunes from this group out of Birmingham, Alabama USA. Check them out at http://www.alamantra.org and http://www.myspace.com/alamantra and share the love! Interesting note: We actually scooped major-market terrestrial radio on that one!!

item.title: Show #18: An evening of jazz with 3rd Man
item.description: 30 minutes of some sweet jazz with featured artist, 3rd Man from Indiana, USA. 3rd Man consists of Peter Kienle (guitar, keyboards), Jack Helsley (acoustic bass), Peter Wilhoit (drums), and special guest Tom Clark (tenor sax). Check out their website: http://www.acmerecords.com/thirdman.php Meantime, kick back with a nice cup of java and enjoy the show!
